protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for the tridecapeptide neurotensin. It is associated with G proteins that activate a phosphatidylinositol- calcium second messenger system

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway

Eur J Pharmacol. 1998 Nov 6;360(2-3):265-72.
